Interface FileInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileClient

    public interface FileInterface
    Interface describing the operations that must be supported by the client application used to talk with the file servers. All methods must be implemented!

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(java.lang.String filename, UserToken token)
      Deletes a file from the server.
      boolean download(java.lang.String sourceFile, java.lang.String destFile, UserToken token)
      Downloads a file from the server.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles(UserToken token)
      Retrieves a list of files that are allowed to be displayed members of the groups encoded in the supplied user token.
      boolean upload(java.lang.String sourceFile, java.lang.String destFile, java.lang.String group, UserToken token)
      Uploads a file to the server to be shared with members of the specified group.

    • Method Detail

      • listFiles

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles(UserToken token)
        Retrieves a list of files that are allowed to be displayed members of the groups encoded in the supplied user token.
        Parameters:
        token - The UserToken object assigned to the user invoking this operation
        Returns:
        A list of filenames

      • upload

        boolean upload(java.lang.String sourceFile,
             java.lang.String destFile,
             java.lang.String group,
             UserToken token)
        Uploads a file to the server to be shared with members of the specified group. This method should only succeed if the uploader is a member of the group that the file will be shared with.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - Path to the local file to upload
        destFile - The filename to use on the server
        group - The group to share this file with
        token - The token of the user uploading the file
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • download

        boolean download(java.lang.String sourceFile,
               java.lang.String destFile,
               UserToken token)
        Downloads a file from the server. The user must be a member of the group with which this file is shared.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The filename used on the server
        destFile - The filename to use locally
        token - The token of the user uploading the file
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure

      • delete

        boolean delete(java.lang.String filename,
             UserToken token)
        Deletes a file from the server. The user must be a member of the group with which this file is shared.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to delete
        token - The token of the user requesting the delete
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure
